paragraph.en: Bacon ipsum dolor amet boudin chislic prosciutto pig strip steak pastrami hamburger landjaeger.  Sirloin meatloaf spare ribs t-bone ham beef ribs.  Kielbasa chuck bacon, shoulder burgdoggen tenderloin tri-tip filet mignon.  Biltong sausage chuck, spare ribs fatback venison hamburger.

paragraph.en: "Come, you yourselves, privately into an isolated place and rest up a little."
paragraph.sm: "Seʻi o tatou ō na o i tatou i se mea tuufua ma fai ai sina mālōlōga."
